// Pivot 0, 0
int R_Flipper[16] = {
	53, 6,
	47, 3,
	7, 7,
	5, 8,
	5, 11,
	7, 12,
	47, 15,
	53, 12
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float R_Flipper[16] = {
	0.929825f, 0.300000f,
	0.824561f, 0.150000f,
	0.122807f, 0.350000f,
	0.087719f, 0.400000f,
	0.087719f, 0.550000f,
	0.122807f, 0.600000f,
	0.824561f, 0.750000f,
	0.929825f, 0.600000f
};
